column2: Roles & ResponsibilitiesPerform high end order processing tasks which requires in-depth knowledge and experience for assigned regions using Oracle JD Edwards, SAP and other applications used by the functionEnsures adherence to all internal / external processes with no slippage on transactions taken up for financial impacting processes/actionsSolves complex problems, takes fresh opinions using existing solutions, be an active participant of the process calls, share ideas with teams/partners to improve processesWorks independently and requires minimal guidanceEffectively collaborate across the team to ensure that mistakes are not repeated by team membersEngage in activities to provide an enhanced customer experienceEnsures adherence to organizational procedures, policies, and systems.Ensures that performance metrics / SLAs are metAdhere to daily turnaround time for orders as per set TAT guidelinesProactively calls out issues that can potentially hamper the business processesSupply to team effort by accomplishing related results as neededAs a Customer Service Representative-Order Management you represent our company well by being responsible, punctual and self motivatedOther RequirementsPreferably bachelors degree (Arts, Science, Commerce, Business Administrations)3-5 years Hands on experience on Order ManagementRequires strong computer skills, including Microsoft officeDisplay excellent verbal and written communication and social skills.Highly thorough and organized with excellent analytic and problem-solving abilitiesAble to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectivelyAbility to work under face pace environmentCustomer orientated and ability to adapt/respond to different types of tasksFlexible to work in Night Shift

column1: Social and Display Insights Specialist II
column2: The Social and Display Insights Specialistwill handle the analysis and reporting mechanisms for the distributed teamfor the Biosciences Division.This person will be developingdata-derived insights and recommendationstooptimizecontent engagement,channel conversion,lead generation, and other important metrics.Additionally, this role will providevolume support and quality checks of display advertising execution.The ideal candidate has experience in working with large data sets pulled from Adobe Analytics or Google Analytics andis able building reports and visualizing metrics in tools such asPowerBI and PowerPoint. Recent hands-on experience in Social Media and Display advertisingis a requirement. This role will routinely perform data analysis, cleansing, and visualization to equip the channel managerswith the actionable insights needed to meet our targets.If MS Excel is your tool of choice,you enjoy being a data detective,describe yourself as meticulous and analytical, andyou get an adrenaline rush from finding new ways to improve channel performance and efficiency, then this is an ideal position for you!To be successful in this newly crafted position, you should be able working in a highly matrix environment in a global organization and becapable of concurrent collaboration with multiple channel partners and managerswithin the global and team with various strengths. We are a diverse, innovative, knowledgeable, and dynamic team looking for the right teammate.Responsibilities: Work with channel specialists to ensure quality control of Display campaign executions.Maintain current performance reporting practices while also working to improve those processes to provide growing levels of granularity and efficiency for the team and to our business partners. Create a standardized reporting calendar and collaborate with Channel Managers on presenting impactful insights and analysis of performance health on a regular cadence through engaging data insights.Participate in scrum ceremonies and follow Agile methodology principles as part of an Agile Marketing team, demonstrating project management software.Stay up to date with the Digital Marketing industry trends to enhance long-term channel strategy.Leverage processes, lessons, standard methodologies, content calendars and documentation from the Global Programmatic Display Managers and Global Social Media Managers to build upon them.Be available during off-hours to participate in meetings with team members based in the US.Experience:3-4 Yrs+ practical experience in B2B customer-centric digital marketing and/or eCommerce, ideal if also experienced in B2C.Robust experience with analytics tools (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics) and data visualization tools (e.g. PowerBI or similar).Strong proficiency in Excel is required.Meaningful understanding and practical knowledge in paid media required, at minimum on native social platforms (eg. Meta, LinkedIn, Google Ads) and Display DSP or ad exchanges (e.g. Adobe Ad Cloud, Sizmek, The Trade Desk or DV360)Experience with project management tools (e.g. Workfront, Jira) preferred.Bachelor's Degree. Experience running multiple strategic execution including ownership and oversight of large budgets of global campaigns.Knowledge, Skills, Abilities:Data-driven thinking with strong analytical skills paired with a good storytelling approach and the ability to analyze large data sets from multiple sources is desired. Proficient at time management, interpersonal, planning and prioritization skills.Excellent teammate with a positive demeanor who is prepared to focus and chip in to achieve business units' objectives.Teamplayer with a positive perspective, one who is never satisfied with the bare minimum needed to accomplish business objectives. Attention to detail.Experience in Agile methodology within a marketing organization is a plus.
column11: B.A, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, MBA/PGDM in Marketing
column13: PowerBI, digital marketing, Google Analytics, data visualization, Adobe Ad Cloud, Sizmek, Jira, Adobe Analytics

Responsible for planning, developing and buying materials, parts, supplies and equipment?? in a timely and cost-effective way; timely manner while maintaining appropriate quality standards and specifications. 26. Develop and review purchase requests and ensure authorization as necessary to facilitate the timely purchase of new food products. 27. Help to lower the cost and secure agreements. 28. Liaise with Accounts Payable Department to ensure accurate and timely payment of invoices, as necessary for the business with the supplier.

column2: Key Responsibilities :-Provide support to country finance, APJ commercial teams on pricing, quoting and invoicing matters.Responsible for developing, deploying, and ingraining operating efficiencies in Pricing !Develop and implement a strong business process !Ensure internal & SOX controls are followed.Ensuring SPR is in line with approval matrix and internal divisional process.Support Annual List Price exercise. Provide analysis and partner with APJ and Country commercial teams to work out list prices. Liaise with factories to upload list prices.Working on building efficient & strong pricing process.Perform margin analysis on discount requests.Support process improvement projects to drive standardization and improvement on pricing, sales and reporting process.Analyze trend and suggest price increase/growth opportunity.Coordinate on day-to-day basis with other functional teams including Commercial, Finance and Supply Chain, Factories, AR, APAC, etc.Collaborate and drive automation and simplification of key projects and work towards improving overall TAT and process quality.Perform analysis on sales, ASP and realized price to drive profitability and growth.Timely & accurate reporting of pricing update and highlight growth areas.Requirements/QualificationsBusiness or Finance related degree with 2-3 years of experienceStrong interpersonal, analytical skills & customer service orientationExcellent digital literacy (Excel, Word)Highly analytical with strong business senseStrong verbal and written communication skills, and interpersonal skills to establish and maintain effective working relationships.Ability to multi-task, meet timelines and be able to adapt in a fast-paced work environmentAbility to balance multiple expectations in a typical Matrix Organization structureAbility to develop high levels of credibility and positive professional relationships with subordinates, peers, and upper management are prerequisites to success in this position
